alert.note: Alert for Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 14 at 12:51AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH FOR AN ICE JAM REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam continues to be possible. * WHERE...The Yukon River at Fort Yukon * WHEN...Through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Ice jam flooding is occuring along the Yukon River at Circle, and is expected to move downstream to Fort Yukon on Sunday. Major flooding is occuring at Circle and large chunks of ice may push over the river bank. Downstream at Fort Yukon impacts could range between minor or severe flooding and ice may push overbank. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - An ice jam is now causing major flooding at Circle and could move downstream to Ft Yukon on Sunday. The first surge of water is expected to arrive in Ft Yukon Sunday. - Http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood - Major flooding is now occuring at Circle. If you live near or along the Yukon River At Ft Yukon stay alert and be prepared to take action.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
